quest.name: The Gift of Joy (Mist)
journal:
The saint's little helper in Mist seeks your assistance in running the Starlight Celebration festivities.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

You have volunteered your services to assist with the Starlight Celebration festivities. Pull on your Starlight tunic, and collect a child's message from one of the Starlight sentinels found within Mist.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
You have collected a letter to the Spinner. Return to the Seagaze Markets and deliver the message to the saint's little helper.
You have delivered the message to the coarse but emotional little helper. Take the gift from the festival volunteer, and hand it to the child waiting nearby.
You have performed your duty as a little helper, and brought gift-wrapped happiness to a child. Report to the saint's little helper in the Seagaze Markets.
The volunteer is pleased with your efforts, and looks forward to your continuing assistance during the remainder of the Starlight Celebration.
objectives: Equip the Starlight tunic and collect a letter to the Spinner from a Starlight sentinel.
Deliver the letter to the Spinner to the saint's little helper.
Equip the Starlight tunic and deliver the lucky star to the waiting youngling.
Report to the saint's little helper.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: Ready for a run through the ward, then, are ye? That's the bloody spirit, lasslad!

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: 'Tis the same job as ye've done afore: find yerself a Starlight sentinel, an' collect one o' them adorable little imps' messages. And don't forget to wear yer bleedin' tunic, all right? Ye know, the bright bloody red one?

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: Oh, an' I s'pose I ought to mention 'ow there's more of them trees about the place aside from the ones what we 'elpers put up─aye, ye might want to check the sentinels what are decoratin' the gardens o' some o' these estates.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: Yer probably thinkin', “Why would I run me arse to the far side o' the ward when I can just grab a letter from the tree over there?” Well, that's 'cause the type o' fallen star ye'll get as a reward'll change dependin' on the sentinel ye took the message from!

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: An' dependin' on the seasonal loot yer lookin' to bag, ye might need yerself a different fallen star to exchange for it. Make sense? Well, the Starlight Celebration crier'll explain it nice an' clearly for ye if me charmin' Lominsan brogue is too 'arsh for yer delicate sensibilities.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The position of Starlight sentinels will be displayed on your minimap. Search the residential area to pinpoint their locations!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can only obtain one seasonal message at a time, so choose your sentinel wisely! Keep in mind which fallen stars are needed to purchase the seasonal goods you wish to acquire.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: Pick a Starlight sentinel somewhere in Mist, an' bring me back one o' them Starlight messages. An' don't forget to wear yer bleedin' tunic!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The position of Starlight sentinels will be displayed on your minimap. Search the residential area to pinpoint their locations!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can only obtain one seasonal message at a time, so choose your sentinel wisely! Keep in mind which fallen stars are needed to purchase the seasonal goods you wish to acquire.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must have the Starlight tunic equipped to continue with this quest.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you have misplaced your Starlight tunic, speak with a Starlight Celebration crier to receive a replacement.

dialogue.name: GUIDE65784
dialogue.text: You've lost your Starlight tunic? Never fear! We've enough spares to dress a small army! Here, take another one!

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: You obtain a Starlight tunic.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: Back now, are ye? Where's me tear-jerkin' message, then?

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: Aye, that's...that's just lovely. Warms me brutish 'eart, it do. Right, time for some gift givin'! 'Ere, take this to the wee bugger waitin' over yonder.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: Go on wiv ye! Go an' 'and out that present afore me stoic facade starts to crumble!

dialogue.name: CHILDA65784
dialogue.text: Hmm, so yer one o' them little 'elpers, are ye? I weren't sure ye'd actually come. ...Is it true ye'll give me a present for writin' that letter?

dialogue.name: CHILDA65784
dialogue.text: Yer really givin' this to me!? Hooray! Me mates'll never believe this!

dialogue.name: CHILDB65784
dialogue.text: Hey! Over here! Aye! Me! Give the toy to me!

dialogue.name: CHILDB65784
dialogue.text: This festival is the best! Thank you!

dialogue.name: CHILDC65784
dialogue.text: You think to deceive me, you crimson-clad charlatan!? I'll have you know I plan on becoming a famous arcanist! My magic eyes will see right through your tricky gift illusions!

dialogue.name: CHILDC65784
dialogue.text: ...This feels solid. Y-You might just be who you say you are. So...I can keep this? Yay! A present for me!

dialogue.name: CHILDA65784
dialogue.text: The grown-ups told me that if I wait 'ere, then a little 'elper'll come an' give me a present. Sounds like a bunch o' bollocks...but I'll stay a mite longer, just in case.

dialogue.name: CHILDB65784
dialogue.text: Awww, you're just an adventurer. Can you move outta the way so the little helper can see me?

dialogue.name: CHILDC65784
dialogue.text: I suspect that the little helper who was meant for me is an impostor. A real helper wouldn't be taking so long. I mean, how many other children can there possibly be!?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must have the Starlight tunic equipped to continue with this quest.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you have misplaced your Starlight tunic, speak with a Starlight Celebration crier to receive a replacement.

dialogue.name: GUIDE65784
dialogue.text: You've lost your Starlight tunic? Never fear! We've enough spares to dress a small army! Here, take another one!

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: You obtain a Starlight tunic.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: 'Anded out yer gift an' brought a child festive joy an' all that, 'ave ye? Good work, good work. Yer a chip off the ol' saint's block!

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: Speakin' o' the ol' saint, Amh Garanjy said she met a white-bearded bloke what was wearin' Starlight garb when she was a but a wee lass 'erself.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: She was weepin' over a special ring she'd lost or summat o' the sort, an' this saint-like fella gave 'er a new one to replace it. Cheered 'er right up, she said.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: Sometimes kindness finds ye when ye least expect it. I'd thought this world a bloody cruel an' lonely place till I met decent folk like you an' Amh Garanjy...

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: ...An' now I'm gettin' all bleedin' emotional again. Sod off, then─ye've done yer part for the now. Maybe I'll see ye back for more work afore the celebration's over an' done, eh?

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: Done wiv yer gift givin', are ye? Ah, I live to see them little buggers' faces light up. Yer doin' good work, lasslad! Come back again afore the celebration's over an' done, eh?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have contributed to the Starlight Celebration in every residential district! Report to Amh Garanjy in the Lavender Beds.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65784
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）
